query: WITH entities AS (SELECT idx, id FROM core_disbursals WHERE (COALESCE((idx, id) < ($3, $2), $2 IS NULL)) ORDER BY idx DESC, id DESC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: DisbursalId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_disbursal_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.idx desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
